_header: This is a wonder merry play and long shall last
_description: On the Fickleness of Fortune — four couplets

BLHar7322.Transcription: Þis is a wondir merie pley & longe ssal lastebot for þi sete is perilous war þe ate laste
BLHar7322.Note: Written as prose inserted into Latin.
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
EETS
         o.s. 15 (1866); repr. 1962; rev. ed. 1903: 236; rev. ed. 265 (2 lines only).
